data.text:
Basic Information

OrangeScape Technologies Ltd. Company Profile Information is operating as a Private Company - Subsidiary. It was officially incorporated on 11 December, 2003, making the company 21 years old. The company was founded in the year 2003. It is categorised as - classified as -. Its Listing Status is -. As per the official records of Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA), the Corporate Identification Number (CIN) of the company is U72200TN2003PTC052129 and Registration Number is -. Additionally, OrangeScape Technologies Ltd. Company’s Scrip Code is . It has been duly registered at Registrar of Companies -.

OrangeScape Technologies Ltd. company’s current MCA status is -. As per the official records, the company’s Authorised Capital is Rs. - and its Paid-up Capital is Rs. -. The last reported Annual General Meeting (ABM) of the company was held on - and the last Balance Sheet was filled on -. The list of current and past investors of the company with their respective Relationship Type, Stake Held and % Stake can be accessed here.

OrangeScape Technologies Ltd. company’s registered address is -. The company’s registered Email ID is -. OrangeScape Technologies Ltd. company’s website is http://www.orangescape.com.

The company is Doing Business As (DBA) Kissflow. It is operating in the Information Technology industry. As for the Business Description, OrangeScape Technologies Ltd. is a visual paas (platform as a service) for building applications. It uses a modeling driven visual development environment for creating business applications and can be deployed.

OrangeScape Technologies Ltd. Company’s Board of Directors are of OrangeScape Technologies Ltd. are Sharad Sharma, Suresh Sabapathy Sambandam, Sabapathy Sambandam, Suresh Sabapathy Sambandam, Sabapathy Sambandam, Aravind Suresh The appointment date of each of the members from the Board of Directors can be accessed here.

The Key Business Developments and recent updates of OrangeScape Technologies Ltd. corporate details can be accessed here.

As for the financial overview of the company, in the previous financial year 2021, its Net Sales was 315.65 and Total Revenue was 316.31. After factoring in the Total Expenditure of 297.15, OrangeScape Technologies Ltd. Company’s EBITDA was 19.16 with an EBITDA margin of 6.06. The company’s EBIT and PAT stood at 6.39 and 2.48 respectively. The resulting PAT was 2.48 with a PAT Margin of 0.78%. The Company had a Debt-to-Equity ratio of 0.40 and Current Ratio of 0.63.
